Don't get me wrong. I'm always happy when someone uploads a bunch of old classic videos. Thank you for that at least.  But two things to consider - #1 - most of us throw these videos into a playlist on random, and the last thing we want is for each of your videos to be prefaced by a really gaudy abuse of some 3D rendering program and home computer video editing featuring a 3D "Skidvid" logo in gold floating over a horrible aquamarine background complete with cheesy video transitions BEFORE EVERY SINGLE VIDEO! *sigh*

#2.  The video compression is awful.  And in this case, the source media is not entirely to blame because even the cheesy, unnecessary "Skidvid" intros have compression artifacts doing backflips and cartwheels across the screen.
